p: Enrichment analysis of the set of differentially regulated genes revealed overrepresentation of several terms in both HIV-exposed and unexposed gene subsets (Fig. 4 framed in blue; Supplementary Table S3). Enrichments were consistent but small. There were also terms associated especially with HIV-exposure mainly in the subset of down-regulated genes. The highest ranking common pathway terms from the Canonical Pathways database were related to HIV infection (Fig. 4; Supplementary Table S3).
